refnamediv.refpurpose: A shared pool of GdkGC objects

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These functions provide access to a shared pool of GdkGC objects. When a new GdkGC is needed, gtk_gc_get() is called with the required depth, colormap and GdkGCValues. If a GdkGC with the required properties already exists then that is returned. If not, a new GdkGC is created. When the GdkGC is no longer needed, gtk_gc_release() should be called.

refsect2.title: gtk_gc_get ()
refsect2.programlisting: GdkGC* gtk_gc_get (gint depth, GdkColormap *colormap, GdkGCValues *values, GdkGCValuesMask values_mask);
refsect2.para: Gets a GdkGC with the given depth, colormap and GdkGCValues. If a GdkGC with the given properties already exists then it is returned, otherwise a new GdkGC is created. The returned GdkGC should be released with gtk_gc_release() when it is no longer needed.

listitem.simpara: the depth of the GdkGC to create.
the GdkColormap (FIXME: I don't know why this is needed).
a GdkGCValues struct containing settings for the GdkGC.
a set of flags indicating which of the fields in values has been set.

refsect2.title: gtk_gc_release ()
refsect2.para: Releases a GdkGC allocated using gtk_gc_get().
